comment: Maple syrup & brown sugar nose, maybe a little nutmeg too, sweet caramel pallette, spicy peppery smoky finish.

1st tasting : Nice vanilla in the start with a touch of leather with usual rye peppery finish.

2nd tasting 3 days later:  The wood spire has changed the whiskey a bit.  Getting a little more leather and spice in the nose but more vanilla and caramel throughout on the palate
